state: Welcome to another fast paced game of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First of all, you could, like, go east. After that, attempt to take a trip east. And then, move south. With that accomplished, try to venture south. And then, make an effort to take a trip west. Then, go south. With that over with, attempt to take a trip east. With that done, try to travel east. Then, try to take a trip south. Next, attempt to go west. And then, attempt to go to the west. And then, attempt to move north. With that over with, make an attempt to go north. Following that, take a trip north. After that, pick-up the coin from the floor of the kitchen. That's it! -= Cellar =- You've entered a cellar. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Cellar =-0/1
